original_title: Navy recovers Kerala Cannabis worth over Rs. 21 mn
original_body_lines: A stock of Kerala Cannabis weighing over 53 kilograms was recovered by the Sri Lanka Navy during an operation in the Veththalakerni.
The stock of cannabis was found in 15 suspicious packages left at the coastal vicinity, Sri Lanka Navy reported.
Accordingly, the seized cannabis, estimated to have a street value of over Rs. 21 million, is currently in naval custody awaiting further legal action by authorities.
